page.title:
What Is A Non-commercialized Acquisition
What Is A Non-commercialized
Acquisition
page.normal_text:
An acquisition where services or supplies are purchased by the government that are unique and uncommon to any other entity
An acquisition where services or
supplies are purchased by the
government that are unique and
uncommon to any other entity

page.title:
What is Contract Financing?
What is Contract Financing?
page.normal_text:
Contract Financing is a “Payment”
Contract Financing is a “Payment”

It is an authorized Government disbursement of monies to a contractor prior to acceptance of supplies or services by the Government
It is an authorized Government disbursement of monies
to a contractor prior to acceptance of supplies or
services by the Government
page.ref:
Reference: FAR 32.001(1)

page.title:
Risks
Risks
page.normal_text:
In establishing contract financing terms, the contracting officer must be aware of certain risks
In establishing contract financing terms, the
contracting officer must be aware of certain risks

When the Government decides to finance a procurement, it assumes both repayment and non-performance risks
When the Government decides to finance a
procurement, it assumes both repayment and
non-performance risks

page.title:

Mitigate Risks

page.title:
Private Funding
Private Funding
page.normal_text:
The contractor secures his own financing without a government guarantee
The contractor secures his own financing without a
